Kebachichi, the leader of that expedition, wore the slain priest's robe and square hat at all public drink- ing parties, in commemoration of the bloody deed. Fe, to avenge those who had suffered the loss either of their lives or their properties, marched with some os his companies into Chaco; but the event did him little honour. He met with a horde of Abipones, but they falsely declared themselves innocent of the slaughters that had been committed.
